channel.title: Pork Ham Bacon Sausage on Caspian Acres

item.title: Pork
item.description: Our pigs live a natural life outside with space to root, run and mud bath to their hearts content. They are fed food scraps from local restaurants and contributors in and around the kamloops area. From time to time we have a limited amount of pork available. Item Price ($/lb) Pork chop 10.00 Bacon, cured 12.00 Spare ribs 8.00 Breakfast sausage 8.
